titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Lionel Hampton should be honored for his contributions to American music.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: 2/26/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Lionel Hampton should be honored for his contributions to American music and for his work as an ambassador of goodwill and democracy.
